name: Point Gravity Prototype
description:
A point-gravity toy!

Slowly move your mouse around over the white boxes to  manipulate them with point-gravity for some fun effects.

If the point-gravity stops working, close the game and re-open it. The point-gravity seems to crash if the window focus is lost for a few moments.

Development

This was made in less than an hour many years ago when I was in high school in the Zero Engine.
